text: Heteroromanticism is a romantic orientation. A heteroromantic person is most likely to have a romantic relationship with a person of the opposite gender or sex. Heteroromantic people can have any sexual orientation. The term heteroromantic is useful for asexual people to describe their affection. The term is related to heterosexuality. The term was created in on-line spaces, such as Asexual Visibility and Education Network. == References == Category:Heterosexuality Category:Romantic orientation
title: Heteroromanticism
